profiles.name: Conservative
profiles.description: Ideal for individuals seeking to preserve capital with a low risk tolerance. Investments are geared towards money market and short-term government bonds.

profiles.name: Moderate
profiles.description: Suitable for individuals with a moderate risk tolerance, looking for a balance between capital preservation and growth. Investments are diversified across all four asset classes.

profiles.name: Balanced
profiles.description: Aimed at individuals with a balanced risk profile, looking for moderate growth over time. Investments are more geared towards global bonds and global equities.

profiles.name: Growth
profiles.description: Ideal for individuals seeking higher growth with a higher risk tolerance. Investments are primarily in global equities.

profiles.name: Aggressive
profiles.description: Suitable for individuals with a high risk tolerance, seeking significant growth. Investments are heavily weighted towards global equities.

funds.name: Shield
funds.description: A highly conservative fund focusing on capital preservation with short-term investments.

funds.name: Compass
funds.description: A moderate risk fund offering a balanced mix of asset classes for steady growth.

funds.name: Scales
funds.description: A balanced risk fund aimed at moderate growth over time through a diversified portfolio.

funds.name: Skyline
funds.description: A growth-oriented fund with a focus on capital appreciation through a higher allocation in global equities.

funds.name: Rocket
funds.description: An aggressive growth fund targeting high returns with a predominant focus on global equities.
